story:
Today we are announcing the shut down of Olive Labs. 

We know how important stress management is and acknowledge the current lack of simple solutions. For the past two years, we have been working tirelessly to bring users a product and experience that would enable a more balanced life. Despite our efforts, we have been unable to secure the funding needed to turn this vision into a sustainable business. We are no longer able to pursue the development of Olive and have decided to shut down Olive Labs.

If you were one of our funders expecting an Olive, you will receive an email within the next week with details about our refund process.

Thank you for being part of our vision for Olive Labs.

Sincerely,
The Olive Team
May 26, 2015




Whether you are managing the expectations of work and life or you are searching for ways to optimize your life, stress can keep us from being our best. 

Olive puts science and technology to work for you.

Olive analyzes your patterns and biological indicators. Olive continuously monitors the complexity of your stress behind the scenes to help you build awareness of your body's stress response. 

Everyone's stress is different. Olive gets to know how stress is triggered for you.


Olive is your personal guide to stress. 

Olive understands your stress over time and provides you with simple solutions that can have a huge impact on the quality of your life. 

Recognizing your stress triggers is the first step in conquering stress. Olive notifies you of increasing stress and helps you conquer it.

Olive discreetly nudges you through gentle taps (haptic feedback) or LED lights on your wrist when it detects elevated stress levels. Olive suggests simple solutions to reverse the negative effects of stress.


If you need help, it's as easy as a swipe to launch an exercise. If you're feeling fine, swipe the other way to ignore it.

Olive works with your smartphone app to cue you through steps of stress management.


Olive preemptively suggests stress management exercises via calming LED indicator lights or gentle, massaging pulses on your wrist to reduce the impact of stress.

Identifying moments when you’re feeling your best and worst are important for taking control of stress. 


Use Olive to capture these moments without having to turn to your phone first because nothing can ruin a wonderful moment like having to fidget with your phone.

Not all of us can walk 10,000 steps a day. Not all of us can sleep 8 hours a day. Not all of us can take 30 minutes to meditate. Olive is here to help.

Our software is designed to understand what your lifestyle patterns look like.

Olive provides little steps to reduce stressors in life, and help you develop the skills to conquer stress when it negatively affects you.

So much information lives on our phones today that can help us create a more complete picture of your lifestyle and what triggers your stress.

Olive integrates your calendar, location, and other available data.

This is combined with metrics from Olive to update our guidance algorithms specifically for your needs.

The longer you use Olive, the more it will understand you - what kinds of activities can help you more effectively manage the stress in your life and when these activities should be incorporated into your daily routine.

Huge outcomes can come from small steps. 

We worked with physicians, researchers, and psychologists to come up with short exercises that help you build your ability to handle daily stress effectively.

By having a wide range of practical exercises based on research in fields ranging from fitness to cognitive behavior therapy, Olive not only hones in on the solutions that work better for you, but Olive also helps you build a skillset that can adapt to the various stressors that you will face in life. 

Olive is best used with a smartphone but can be used in standalone mode.


Olive will still detect the physiological signs of stress and help guide you to utilize and control your breath over time. Mindful breathing is a fundamental tool for conquering stress.

Olive is loaded with hardware and extras.


Get an extra strap to change up your Olive style.

In the future, we will be releasing more strap colors so that there will be a color for everyone and for every occasion. 

A charger worthy of your dresser.

Olive ships with a standard USB charger, but if you want to charge your Olive with ease and style, upgrade to a Pedestal Charger. 

This premium accessory holds your Olive upright while charging and fits in with your jewelry dresser or your watch stand.


Stress may seem like a necessary evil in modern society, but it is a fundamental part of how our bodies function. 

When we are threatened, our bodies initiate a stress response, releasing hormones, increasing heart rate, and supplying sugar to our muscles. These changes were the difference between life and death for cavemen. 

Fast forward to today, our minds have evolved a lot faster than our bodies. Our bodies still respond to things that threaten us, but the "stressors" that our minds perceive as threats are often no longer imminent physical threats. 

They are things like bills and deadlines. These aren't threats that you can deal with in the next 30 seconds, let alone the next 30 days. 

 

When our bodies persistently remain stressed, the stress response comes at a cost. Certain body functions like digestion and immune system get put on hold, and it can even cause lapses in memory and judgement.

This is why the ability to be aware of your stress response and the skills to manage it are so critical to your quality of life. This is why we're making Olive. 

From design to prototyping and testing, Olive has come a long way.

We have made multiple iterations of our sensor hardware and are working on:

  • Merging industrial design and electrical engineering work streams
  • Developing the user experience for the mobile app
  • Increasing the sophistication of our machine learning algorithms through more testing and experimentation
  • Setting up pilot studies for next iteration of Olive prototypes in partnership with major academic medical centers

What is next?

  • 2014: Design for manufacturing
  • Spring 2015: Design and engineering validation testing
  • Summer to Fall 2015: Tooling and production
Where do the funds go?

  • Electrical engineering design for manufacturing ($20K)
  • Software development ($15K)
  • Validation testing ($5K)
  • Tooling ($25K)
  • Manufacturing ($30K)
  • Shipping & packaging ($5K)

We are a group of designers, engineers, and strategists with a diverse set of backgrounds who came together to work on Olive because we know loved ones and friends who struggle under the weight of stress.

 Alejandra Castelao / Industrial Designer
industrial designer at award winning design firms / college for creative studies grad / curator of tangible experiences
Corey Hall / Brand Strategist
designer / former frog / current googler / vcu graphic design / less but better
Hardy Simes / COO
product launcher / biohacker / polyglot / wharton alum / serial optimist
Hiro Ellis / CEO
mechanical engineer / former innovation strategist at frog design / wharton alum / avid surfer
Pat Brandon / Product Lead
mechatronics engineer / builder of communications hardware for the international space station / lifelong runner
Ron Rosenman / Software Developer
wielder of code, form, and data to build tools, run simulations and deploy solutions / father of three little boys 


Backing and Shipping

Do I need to add the cost of shipping to my contribution?

If you are in the US or Canada, shipping is included in your perk contribution. If you are outside of the US or Canada, please add $25 to your contribution for international shipping.

What if I forgot to add international shipping to my contribution?

No problem! Use the "international shipping" perk to add the $25 for international shipping to your previous contribution.

Where do I put my address?

You will be required to enter a shipping address when backing any of the product perks through Indiegogo. We will also be emailing all backers prior to shipping asking for updated mailing addresses. If your address changes before we ship your Olive products, feel free to email us at team@witholive.com. 

Can I choose what size and color I want for my Olive?

Yes! At the end of the campaign, we will be emailing everyone a sizing chart for Olive and provide a way to confirm their preferred color and size. This way you have a little time if you change your mind!

When will I get my Olive?

Estimated shipping dates are for delivery in November 2015. We will start working with our beta testers in the spring.

Compatibility

What smartphone operating systems will Olive work with?

We are currently working on an iOS app as well as a version which will support the most common Android phones. Olive's digital features can also be accessed via web application through a web browser on a phone, tablet, or computer.

Will Olive work with my tablet?

An iPad app is currently on our roadmap. We will be evaluating the need for an Android tablet app in the future and we will decide then if we will optimize the Android app for use on Android tablets.

Use and Functionality

Does Olive tell time?

Olive is not a watch. It was consciously designed without a watch face so that you could wear it with your favorite watch or smart watch.

Do I need to wear Olive all the time?

For the most useful experience, it is recommended that you wear the bracelet all the time (except in water). The more you wear Olive, the better it gets to you know you. The better Olive knows you, the more personalized its stress management recommendations will be.

Can I shower or swim with Olive?

No. Olive is designed to be water and shock resistant to handle the wear of everyday use like washing your hands.

Does Olive track my physical activity and sleep?

Yes. Both physical activity and sleep are monitored by Olive and analyzed in order to show you how your lifestyle and habits impact your stress. This is all in an effort to make stress more tangible and offer you tailored solutions to manage it.

How tight should I wear Olive?

For Olive’s sensors to get the most accurate readings, Olive should be worn snug around your wrist.

How do I charge Olive?

Each Olive is shipped with a standard USB charging cable. It is also possible to upgrade to the Pedestal Charger which will stylishly display your Olive while charging.

Where is my data stored? Is it safe?

Data is stored on the band then securely transmitted to servers using the latest encryption and security protocols. We don’t mess around with user data privacy and security.

Thank You Program

How does it work?

We want to reward you for referring your friends and family to support Olive. You get money back every time someone buys an Olive using your link!

I can't find my unique code...

First, make sure you're logged in to Indiegogo (your name will appear on the upper right corner of the page). Then use any of the buttons that appear under the video, or head to www.technology-crowdfunding.com/olive and share using the buttons there. There will be a 7-digit number at the end of the link, and that's your unique code!

How can I check how many people have I referred?

Sign in on Indiegogo, and click on your name above the search box at the top right of the page. Click "My Profile" from the drop-down menu, then click on the “Referrals” tab to see totals of your referrals and contributions that resulted from your sharing!

When will I receive my refund?

We'll add up the all of your referrals at the end of the campaign, and anyone who has successfully referred a friend to buy an Olive will receive a refund!
story_txt:
Today we are announcing the shut down of Olive Labs. We know how important stress management is and acknowledge the current lack of simple solutions. For the past two years, we have been working tirelessly to bring users a product and experience that would enable a more balanced life. Despite our efforts, we have been unable to secure the funding needed to turn this vision into a sustainable business. We are no longer able to pursue the development of Olive and have decided to shut down Olive Labs.If you were one of our funders expecting an Olive, you will receive an email within the next week with details about our refund process.Thank you for being part of our vision for Olive Labs.
Sincerely,
The Olive Team
May 26, 2015





Whether you are managing the expectations of work and life or you are searching for ways to optimize your life, stress can keep us from being our best. 
Olive puts science and technology to work for you.





Olive analyzes your patterns and biological indicators. Olive continuously monitors the complexity of your stress behind the scenes to help you build awareness of your body's stress response. 
Everyone's stress is different. Olive gets to know how stress is triggered for you.



Olive is your personal guide to stress. 
Olive understands your stress over time and provides you with simple solutions that can have a huge impact on the quality of your life. 


Recognizing your stress triggers is the first step in conquering stress. Olive notifies you of increasing stress and helps you conquer it.



Olive discreetly nudges you through gentle taps (haptic feedback) or LED lights on your wrist when it detects elevated stress levels. Olive suggests simple solutions to reverse the negative effects of stress.


If you need help, it's as easy as a swipe to launch an exercise. If you're feeling fine, swipe the other way to ignore it.


Olive works with your smartphone app to cue you through steps of stress management.


Olive preemptively suggests stress management exercises via calming LED indicator lights or gentle, massaging pulses on your wrist to reduce the impact of stress.


Identifying moments when you’re feeling your best and worst are important for taking control of stress. 




Use Olive to capture these moments without having to turn to your phone first because nothing can ruin a wonderful moment like having to fidget with your phone.




Not all of us can walk 10,000 steps a day. Not all of us can sleep 8 hours a day. Not all of us can take 30 minutes to meditate. Olive is here to help.

Our software is designed to understand what your lifestyle patterns look like.
Olive provides little steps to reduce stressors in life, and help you develop the skills to conquer stress when it negatively affects you.
So much information lives on our phones today that can help us create a more complete picture of your lifestyle and what triggers your stress.Olive integrates your calendar, location, and other available data.
This is combined with metrics from Olive to update our guidance algorithms specifically for your needs.
The longer you use Olive, the more it will understand you - what kinds of activities can help you more effectively manage the stress in your life and when these activities should be incorporated into your daily routine.
Huge outcomes can come from small steps. 
We worked with physicians, researchers, and psychologists to come up with short exercises that help you build your ability to handle daily stress effectively.

By having a wide range of practical exercises based on research in fields ranging from fitness to cognitive behavior therapy, Olive not only hones in on the solutions that work better for you, but Olive also helps you build a skillset that can adapt to the various stressors that you will face in life. 


Olive is best used with a smartphone but can be used in standalone mode.
Olive will still detect the physiological signs of stress and help guide you to utilize and control your breath over time. Mindful breathing is a fundamental tool for conquering stress.





Olive is loaded with hardware and extras.




Get an extra strap to change up your Olive style.
In the future, we will be releasing more strap colors so that there will be a color for everyone and for every occasion. 




A charger worthy of your dresser.Olive ships with a standard USB charger, but if you want to charge your Olive with ease and style, upgrade to a Pedestal Charger. 
This premium accessory holds your Olive upright while charging and fits in with your jewelry dresser or your watch stand.








Stress may seem like a necessary evil in modern society, but it is a fundamental part of how our bodies function. 
When we are threatened, our bodies initiate a stress response, releasing hormones, increasing heart rate, and supplying sugar to our muscles. These changes were the difference between life and death for cavemen. 
Fast forward to today, our minds have evolved a lot faster than our bodies. Our bodies still respond to things that threaten us, but the "stressors" that our minds perceive as threats are often no longer imminent physical threats. 

They are things like bills and deadlines. These aren't threats that you can deal with in the next 30 seconds, let alone the next 30 days. 


 

When our bodies persistently remain stressed, the stress response comes at a cost. Certain body functions like digestion and immune system get put on hold, and it can even cause lapses in memory and judgement.This is why the ability to be aware of your stress response and the skills to manage it are so critical to your quality of life. This is why we're making Olive. 


From design to prototyping and testing, Olive has come a long way.

We have made multiple iterations of our sensor hardware and are working on:




Merging industrial design and electrical engineering work streams


Developing the user experience for the mobile app


Increasing the sophistication of our machine learning algorithms through more testing and experimentation


Setting up pilot studies for next iteration of Olive prototypes in partnership with major academic medical centers




What is next?




2014: Design for manufacturing


Spring 2015: Design and engineering validation testing


Summer to Fall 2015: Tooling and production


Where do the funds go?




Electrical engineering design for manufacturing ($20K)


Software development ($15K)


Validation testing ($5K)


Tooling ($25K)


Manufacturing ($30K)


Shipping & packaging ($5K)



We are a group of designers, engineers, and strategists with a diverse set of backgrounds who came together to work on Olive because we know loved ones and friends who struggle under the weight of stress.









Alejandra Castelao / Industrial Designerindustrial designer at award winning design firms / college for creative studies grad / curator of tangible experiences








Corey Hall / Brand Strategistdesigner / former frog / current googler / vcu graphic design / less but better








Hardy Simes / COOproduct launcher / biohacker / polyglot / wharton alum / serial optimist








Hiro Ellis / CEOmechanical engineer / former innovation strategist at
frog design / wharton alum / avid surfer
  








Pat Brandon / Product Leadmechatronics engineer / builder of communications hardware for the international space station / lifelong runner
  








Ron Rosenman / Software Developerwielder of code, form, and data to build tools, run simulations and deploy solutions / father of three little boys

If you are outside of the US or Canada, please add $25 to your contribution for international shipping.What if I forgot to add international shipping to my contribution?No problem! Use the "international shipping" perk to add the $25 for international shipping to your previous contribution.Where do I put my address?You will be required to enter a shipping address when backing any of the product perks through Indiegogo. We will also be emailing all backers prior to shipping asking for updated mailing addresses. If your address changes before we ship your Olive products, feel free to email us at team@witholive.com. Can I choose what size and color I want for my Olive?Yes! story:
My name is Adrian and i am a female to male transgender person i am 22 years old. i was born female and i began transitoning to male in 2008 and ive been on hormones for 4 years i live my life 100% socially as a man. i really want to match my body to how i feel in my brain. i am trying to raise some money so i can get male chest reconstructive surgery. this is the complete removal of the breasts double mastectomy. this is the most important goal in my life at the moment because i really feel like it will change everything for me and make me a much better and happier person. the problem is i can not afford the surgery i am on disability, and it is extremly expensive. i can barely afford to eat and pay rent let alone save for this. insurance companies will NOT pay for any of the surgery. i hate asking anyone for anything but i have to say im desperate for some kind of help. not being able to have this has really hindered me i just want to get past this.

 

a bit about myself i love cats and playing video games, i like all kinds of art and i like biking and being with my friends!

i need an estimate amount of $9000  for they surgery and all the hospital fees, travel expense since i will be traveling to florida from massachusetts for the surgery i have to take someone with me to take care of me and also fly there and stay in a hotel for 10 days.

any donation would mean the world to me and you would be helping me more than you even know this is going to change everything for me. i need this surgery to really achieve happiness and inner peace with myself. i need it so i can be who i really am physically not just mentally

if you cant donate please share this so others can see it
thank you! <3

story: Baby J!
story_txt: Baby J!

story:
Our Story

May 2011, my husband Qaa'im and I got married the same day we both officially graduated (I had just completed my M.F.A. in sculpture and he finshed his B.F.A. in Graphic Design/Digital Media with a minor in Art History). Off we went with some close family to a near by park and got hitched.

Fast forward a few months later: We get the happy news that we're expecting our first child!! I was working full-time at a hotel for the summer, gearing up for my first semester of teaching at Memphis College of Art. My husband had two different contracts for design projects and life was humming along.

 

And then it all changed...

 

By the beginning of August, I wasn't able to keep any food or fluids down. We figured it was just the genetics I was blessed with and waited eagerly for me to reach the 12 week mark where things had leveled out during my mother's pregnancies. The semester began and I made it into September, puke bags in tow when I went off to teach. 12 weeks came and rather than getting better it got worse.

 

Around the same time my symptoms worsened, my husbands contracts fell through. He wasn't working and I was barely managing it. Three visits to the ER later and I was put on bedrest - where I've been since September 23rd. We've moved from Memphis to live with my parents until the baby is born and we're able to get on our feet again.

 

My husband is still actively seeking work (anything from stocking shelves to coding websites) and we're still waiting on something to come through.


The Impact

By assisting us with paying for the prenatal care, we'll know that we are able to get the best care for our unborn child. Additionally, what little we are able to make now will be able to go towards food, other medical bills (for myself and thus the baby), and hopefully a trip to see my husband's parents in the near future. (His father is undergoing his last round of chemo therapy soon and we haven't been able to visit them since he was diagnosed with cancer back in May.)


What We Need & What You Get

Though we have plenty of other bills, we are simply asking for assistance with the baby. As our funds are limited, we would love to thank you personally with a video, progress on how the baby is doing, and photos of the little one that you have so graciously helped after they are born. For larger donations ($500+) we'll be willing to create a custom art piece as well.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't donate, helping us get the word out would be amazing! We are required to pay for the prenatal care by 36 weeks, so the sooner we are able to achieve our goal, the sooner we can make sure the baby's health is completely taken care of!!

 

Thank you in advance to all of those able to help!!!!!

story:
Amara is a  17 year old TBI (traumatic brain injury survior) and miracle. She was so grateful for all the family,friends and community support she had received during her recovery, she wanted to pay it forward and help others in need. Amara learned to redirect her creative energies from dance/acrobatics to making homemade cards/crafts to families who face chronic medical and financial hardships.

Amara's helping ministry program '"Riccio-Pick Me ups" became an official nonprofit organization, September, 15th, 2011. Since RPMU became nonprofit, Amara was able to add many helping programs.

 

 The following are added Riccio-Pick Me Up programs;

Caregiver Retreat   Caregivers of family members who face chronic illnesses need e break! They will receive a gift card of an activity of choice. {Movies, dinner, bowling, etc...}

 

 Pick Me Up Donation: Caregivers will receive a gift card or money for gas and food expenses during frequent doctor visits or hospital visits.

 

RPMU Homemade Craft/Card:  A sick adult or child will receive a homemade craft/card to lift their spirits. Examples are; personalized bears inspirational bracelets, paintings and many more

 

Share the gift of Art/Music to Hospitals and Rehabilitation Centers for children and adults. We also spread joy to patients rooms in acute care hospitals.

 

Spread disability Awareness to local schools [power point presentation]

Local Police Officer and Brain Injury Case Manager join Amara with the presentation. Amara also has a signature awareness rap.

 

Seasonal Miracle Magazine:  Sick children and adults share their talents, submitting recipes, poems, jokes and various activities.

 

Amara writes inspirational children’s stories using animals,which teach many different life lessons.

RPPMU has quarterly Fundraisers, but unfortunatly we still don't have enough funds to fufill our mission.

 

Amara has managed to inspire many people, who now help out with RPMU. They will make craft/cards, help out in the hospital, the magazine, and help with our fundraisers.

Riccio-Pick Me Ups will benefit from monetary grants to continue helping our families with our existing helping programs to flourish. We want to be able to send more caregivers on retreats, buy more materials for art/music activities at hospitals and send more donations. Riccio-Pick Me Ups would also like to supplement patients’ medical expenses, when insurance denies coverage or pays only partial payment. We also would like to publish Miracle's Magazine and her inspirational children's stories (Miracles climb, Cady's triumph, Hardy's gift.......)

 

Any donation means the world to us. Remember you are not just helping one family or one cause, you'll make a difference to many families in need. We support all causes or any type of serious illnesss and  financial hardship.

 

 

Thank you very much,

Lori and Amara Riccio

www.ricciopickmeups.org

story:
Returning to the Kitchen

Four years ago, I started teaching cooking, baking, and food preservation classes from my home in Portland, Oregon. Lost Arts Kitchen got off to a great start. My mission was to empower people who wanted to reclaim the kitchen literacy that enabled our ancestors to thrive without grocery stores, take out, and microwaves. As part of my mission and as a way to give back to my community, I also organized a food buying club for people who live and work in East Portland, connecting farmers and distributors offering high quality meat, produce, milk, eggs, and dry goods with an extended network of friends and neighbors.

But I put my business and my involvement in the buying club on hold for a year while facing two health crises in my family (read our story for details). I personally witnessed how dramatically diet can impact well being. When our family came out of crisis mode, I began to think about returning to work. I felt called to help others who need nourishing, home cooked meals but lack the time, energy or resources to prepare it themselves. I decided to work as a personal chef for individuals and families looking for nourishing meals made to order with high quality ingredients.

Offering personal chef services is a logical next step in my career path. With over two decades of experience cooking, baking and preserving whole foods at home, I have honed my craft, studied a wide variety of cuisines and diets, modified recipes to adhere to multiple restrictions, and developed dozens of my own special diet recipes. This year I am studying nutritional therapy to broaden my understanding of the healing power of food. For years, I have practiced the same preparation techniques at home that personal chefs use when preparing meals for clients and have a sizable repertoire of delicious recipes at my disposal. I am ready to rock some taste buds with wholesome deliciousness.

What Can Nourishing Home Cooked Food Do?

 While most of us know that proper diet is one of the foundations of optimal health, in our culture, understanding of the therapeutic role of food in healing is limited. Until I personally witnessed several dietary "miracle" cures right in my own circle of friends, I hadn't appreciated the healing powers of foods. In fact, I was (and remain) a skeptic and took some convincing. I know four kids who were formerly diagnosed as autistic and are no longer on the autism spectrum thanks to dietary changes. I know many adults, with a wide variety of health complaints, who only found healing after making dietary changes.

Once I started looking, I saw "miracles" happening everywhere. People are reversing conditions like Alzheimer's disease, autism, cancer, diabetes, epilepsy, multiple sclerosis, and thyroid disease with diet. Except, there's nothing really miraculous about the healing powers of real foods. Broths, lactofermented foods like sauerkraut and yogurt, meat and eggs from pastured animals, wild caught fish and seafood, healthy fats, raw foods, and sea vegetables support the body's own healing processes. These foods provide vitamins, minerals, enzymes, proteins, essential fatty acids, and beneficial bacteria and give our interconnected systems what they need to repair and function optimally.

The healing properties of food are lost when it's subjected to conventional farming practices, modern packaging processes like canning and pasteurization, and chemical preservatives. For many, the hardest part of implementing dietary changes for health recovery is finding the time to plan, shop, and prepare these healing foods at home. It can be especially hard to feed yourself well when you don’t feel well or you are caring for someone with special needs. My mission is to provide deeply nourishing food for those who need it most.

What I Need & What You'll Get for Helping

I've researched the personal chef business, built a web site, and started networking with potential clients and professionals who can refer clients to me. I'm ready to get my business licensed, insured, and launched. Like so many, our family has had its share of financial hits over the last four years. My husband was unemployed for a total of 16 months between September 2008 and May 2010. While we're thankful we had health insurance at all during this last year of medical issues (we didn't for the three years prior), we still have a pile of doctor and hospital bills to pay. Our savings are depleted and our credit cards are maxed.

To get started, I have determined that I need about $1800. This will cover

  • membership in a professional organization like the USPCA or the APPCA
  • one year of liability insurance
  • new business cards
  • marketing materials to send to naturopaths, family doctors, endocrinologists, nutrition professional and other healthcare providers likely to refer clients
  • a few pieces of useful kitchen equipment (I have most of my cook-kit ready)

I’ll apply funds in the order listed, so that even if I don’t achieve my goal, I can get insured and start cooking for the clients I already have.   Besides knowing that you are helping someone fulfill a mission that will help others regain their health, a contribution to my campaign will make you eligible for goodies from me and my kitchen. See the perks on the right side of this page.

  Even if you cannot make a cash contribution now, it would mean so much to me if you could spread the word. Please tweet, share on Facebook, or send an email to friends who would like to support my campaign. Thank you!
story_txt:
Returning to the Kitchen
Four years ago, I started teaching cooking, baking, and food preservation classes from my home in Portland, Oregon. Lost Arts Kitchen got off to a great start. My mission was to empower people who wanted to reclaim the kitchen literacy that enabled our ancestors to thrive without grocery stores, take out, and microwaves. As part of my mission and as a way to give back to my community, I also organized a food buying club for people who live and work in East Portland, connecting farmers and distributors offering high quality meat, produce, milk, eggs, and dry goods with an extended network of friends and neighbors.
But I put my business and my involvement in the buying club on hold for a year while facing two health crises in my family (read our story for details). I personally witnessed how dramatically diet can impact well being. When our family came out of crisis mode, I began to think about returning to work. I felt called to help others who need nourishing, home cooked meals but lack the time, energy or resources to prepare it themselves. I decided to work as a personal chef for individuals and families looking for nourishing meals made to order with high quality ingredients.
Offering personal chef services is a logical next step in my career path. With over two decades of experience cooking, baking and preserving whole foods at home, I have honed my craft, studied a wide variety of cuisines and diets, modified recipes to adhere to multiple restrictions, and developed dozens of my own special diet recipes. This year I am studying nutritional therapy to broaden my understanding of the healing power of food. For years, I have practiced the same preparation techniques at home that personal chefs use when preparing meals for clients and have a sizable repertoire of delicious recipes at my disposal. I am ready to rock some taste buds with wholesome deliciousness.
What Can Nourishing Home Cooked Food Do?
 While most of us know that proper diet is one of the foundations of optimal health, in our culture, understanding of the therapeutic role of food in healing is limited. Until I personally witnessed several dietary "miracle" cures right in my own circle of friends, I hadn't appreciated the healing powers of foods. In fact, I was (and remain) a skeptic and took some convincing. I know four kids who were formerly diagnosed as autistic and are no longer on the autism spectrum thanks to dietary changes. I know many adults, with a wide variety of health complaints, who only found healing after making dietary changes.
Once I started looking, I saw "miracles" happening everywhere. People are reversing conditions like Alzheimer's disease, autism, cancer, diabetes, epilepsy, multiple sclerosis, and thyroid disease with diet. Except, there's nothing really miraculous about the healing powers of real foods. Broths, lactofermented foods like sauerkraut and yogurt, meat and eggs from pastured animals, wild caught fish and seafood, healthy fats, raw foods, and sea vegetables support the body's own healing processes. These foods provide vitamins, minerals, enzymes, proteins, essential fatty acids, and beneficial bacteria and give our interconnected systems what they need to repair and function optimally.
The healing properties of food are lost when it's subjected to conventional farming practices, modern packaging processes like canning and pasteurization, and chemical preservatives. For many, the hardest part of implementing dietary changes for health recovery is finding the time to plan, shop, and prepare these healing foods at home. It can be especially hard to feed yourself well when you don’t feel well or you are caring for someone with special needs. My mission is to provide deeply nourishing food for those who need it most.
What I Need & What You'll Get for Helping
I've researched the personal chef business, built a web site, and started networking with potential clients and professionals who can refer clients to me. I'm ready to get my business licensed, insured, and launched. Like so many, our family has had its share of financial hits over the last four years. My husband was unemployed for a total of 16 months between September 2008 and May 2010. While we're thankful we had health insurance at all during this last year of medical issues (we didn't for the three years prior), we still have a pile of doctor and hospital bills to pay. Our savings are depleted and our credit cards are maxed.
To get started, I have determined that I need about $1800. This will cover

membership in a professional organization like the USPCA or the APPCA

one year of liability insurance
new business cards
marketing materials to send to naturopaths, family doctors, endocrinologists, nutrition professional and other healthcare providers likely to refer clients
a few pieces of useful kitchen equipment (I have most of my cook-kit ready)
I’ll apply funds in the order listed, so that even if I don’t achieve my goal, I can get insured and start cooking for the clients I already have.   Besides knowing that you are helping someone fulfill a mission that will help others regain their health, a contribution to my campaign will make you eligible for goodies from me and my kitchen. See the perks on the right side of this page.
  Even if you cannot make a cash contribution now, it would mean so much to me if you could spread the word. Please tweet, share on Facebook, or send an email to friends who would like to support my campaign. Thank you!

story:
I am a newly graduated Yoga Teacher. I am originally from Scotland and came to Vancouver to study with Vancouver School of Yoga.

Having graduated I would now like to stay in Vancouver until the end of August and teach Yoga Classes in and around Vancouver. I hope to host all of these classes outdoors as to make the best of the beautiful weather and surround ourselves with Nature.

I want to encourage people to engage with their bodies and their minds, and have some fun with it. I am eager to begin teaching and build up experience. Vancouver feels like the best place to do this, it is a great city with such diversity. The money raised will be used to keep me here for the month of August and assist me in creating tools needed to teach these classes and create a community.

story:
Oncoming headlight blindness is now a thing of the past...

The oncoming headlight-blindness is annoying, bothering. Not being able to see the road for seconds is very dangerous! Night Rider is the first, really affordable innovation which can prevent any drivers' vision from temporary impairment.

54% OFF the price for the first 100 contributor

Night driving is unpleasant, dangerous and full of distractions. Use Night Rider to make it enjoyable, distraction free and above all - SAFE!


Our solution is:







There are more than 1 Billion cars worldwide without efficient equipment against the headlight-blindness effect for the drivers. This everyday-danger causes fatal accidents day by day.


Scary statistics

There are more than 1 billion vehicle on roads worldwide. Most of them are driven at night week by week also. There was no solution for any of their drivers to avoid the headlight-blindness effect.


620.000 people die every year at night

1.240.000 people die on roads year by year and half of them at nighttime. This number is extremely high. Nighttime is generally from 8 pm to 6 am. Significant part of drivers go before 12pm and the density of the traffic is much lower than at the daytime. Despite the lower number of vehicles concerned in nighttime traffic, half of the fatalities occured in this period.

Commercial airliner transport had totally 224 fatalities by crashes in 2013.


Drivers know, that headlight blindness is a very dangerous part of the nighttime travel as the road in front of the driver is unsighted for seconds. Warning signs of an approaching danger remain undetectable during this time and unfortunately this causes fatal accidents lots of time.


WHO (World Health Organisation) reports that on-road fatalities will reach the 1.9 Million per year by the year 2020! It is 53% more than in the year 2012.


You get USD 2 per referral that results in a pledge. Just share this campaign with as many people as possible and earn your Night Rider for Free.

Click here to learn how to participate in our referral program.



Real & Affordable

Night Rider is the only real and affordable solution for vision blindness at night due to headlight glare. It consists of two pieces of dark shades, mounted on a light weight frame. The shades are uniquely positioned in front of the eyes so that a slight head tilt deviates the position of eyes onto the shades.


The opposite side of the road is darkened /only the oncoming, not your lane/, in turn effectively neutralizing the blinding glare of the headlight form the vehicle in front - no matter however bright it is. The special locating of the shades ensure that your vision remains clear and is not impaired in any matter - whatsoever.

Why?

What gave us the idea to develop the oncoming headlight blocker glasses? Just like everyone else, we were also concerned about the irritating glares from oncoming headlights and the subsequent danger this posed to human lives.
Peter, the inventor of the Night Rider is an everyday driver at night. The contionous glares from the opposite side made him to find a solution. This was the birth of the Night Rider.

More than 620.000 people die every year in nighttime accidents on roads globally. Now you can help a life-saver innovation to be available for everyone.



Who for?


Everyday drivers       The more miles you drive the bigger risk you take. Night Rider                                         should be in your car daily.


Sunday drivers          Substitute the everyday driving routine with a better vision at                                           night.


Elders                          Sensitivity for oncoming bright light increases with age. Night                                           Rider rejuvenates your vision at night.


Young drivers             New on roads? Night Rider gives you additional assistance for                                         night trips.


Nyctalopia                  Suffering from night blindness? Night Rider gives you a helping                                       hand to filter the bright headlights at night.


Truck drivers              We don’t have to convince you, do we?




Difference between the yellow tinted or other driving glasses and the Night Rider

Yellow tinted glasses are told to increase contrast in nightfall. They cannot do anything against the glaring headlights. Furthermore at night, when there is lack of light, we (and opticians) would not recommend to take on any colored glasses. It is basic physics. All colors filter the light, going through the lense. So that you have less vision coming to your eyes. With the Night Rider you have no lense between your eyes and the road, the lense is positioned to be only between your eyes and the oncoming traffic. It is just the annoying part of your vision.

There are also told to be "anti-glare" coated glasses to prevent the eyes from glaring lights but there is the same problem. If the lense is situated in front of all your eyes, it will reflect all the lights. A simple coating cannot choose the light source to filter. What about the Night Rider? It also cannot separate but the lenses are situated to cover only the annoying part of the road and only by your small headtilt indeed.



Do you cringe and swear for a solution when a vehicle's headlights blind you? Do you think, night driving is dangerous and you try to avoid it? Than Night Rider is just the product the doctor ordered for you.


Night Rider is a fully developed and tested product.


Night Rider Basic (black)



Night Rider UP (many colors, see our gallery)



Night Rider Up also has black shades. For the perfect darkening effect the shades are to be transparent black. We have provided multiple color choice in the frames.


Get your Night Rider for Free! Share our campaign, attract your friends.

Take part in our refferal program for refund. Turn the social media to money with the Night Rider campaign for yourself.

Sharing our campaign you can attract people to be our contributor. We give 2 USD refund after every successfull referral.


How?

Indiegogo has a fantastic feature. Each logged in member has special URL codes to every campaigns. So that we can track your incoming guests. Sharing our campaign, you get 2 USD refund after every contributor, who are coming to our campaign through your shared link.

After you logged in to your Indiegogo account, you just have to copy the URL from your browser and send it to your friends. You can also use social media or just share our campaign with automatic URL sharing with the buttons above. 

Learn more about our referral program HERE.





Millions need it day by day already. There is a huge importance in the nighttime traffic for the Night Rider.



Target levels


We need a minimum of USD 25.000 to bring this LIFE SAVING innovation to people around the world. However, if you support us to the hilt, we have exciting plans as stretch goals as mentioned below. Unlocking any target level, all contributors will enjoy the new features.

The final goal is to make the night drive much safer but there are steps which can make us closer to that. Making the best product available to everyone is our goal.





Night Rider is for everyone. Each contributor takes part of the safer night driving to come true. Join us and cooperate for a safer traffic.



Colorful cases

We ship out the Night Rider in black or white hard cases, up to your choice but we would like to have plenty of colorful cases also. One of our Target Level will unlock this feature. After that all of our contributors (supporters before reaching of the Target Level also) will able to re-choose their wished case if want a colorful instead the white or black case.


Bicolor Night Rider

We know, you want your Night Rider in your style. We will make it available for you. Reaching our target level, the Bicolor version will be available also. If you already backed for a Night Rider, you will be able to upgrade the UP model to a bicolor version for only 1 USD.


Patterned Night Rider

The same. We want to make Night Riders with iconic schemes like military, carbonfibre, gold, chrome, animals, flowers, textile coated, striped, spotted, hearts, wood-like, etc.


Referral Competition Prize

Unlocking this target level we will send our top 3 referrals with their partner to an advanced driving course to acquire the know-how of the safe drive. We don't want to reveal every detail yet but can say it will be incredibly exciting. Adrenaline junkies would love.


Your family is more secured during a nighttime travel if the oncoming drivers wear Night Rider. This campaign will help them to get their own.



Night Rider 2

We cannot tell too much about our next product as it is not developed yet and is an intellectual property also, but can proudly say, we have invented the semi-automatic working Night Rider which will revolutionize the nighttime traffic even better than the Night Rider. Unlocking the target level we can finish the development and give a 30% discount to everyone who took apart in this campaign. Whichever perk you choose, you will get a discount coupon, which you will be able to exchange as soon as it will be ready, around the Q3 2014. Help us, help everyone on the roads. Your trust will make it available. (above .gif is not taken of the Night Rider 2)


How does the Night Rider work?

NIGHT RIDER is a so simple solution, can be used by anyone. The principle of its operation is that the shaders are situated so close to the eyes, it is enough to tilt your head forward not more than 3-5 degrees and it absolutely darkens the blinding headlights.

We developed the shaders to darken only just as much as it is really needed to not be blinded by the oncoming traffic, but it is still transparent enough to follow their course perfectly. The darkening level is just as much as it is used to be built in to the rearview mirrors in the cars.




Principle of work

Night Rider consists of two pieces of dark shades on a frame, uniquely positioned in front of the eyes so that a slight head tilt deviates the eyes’ positions on the pieces of shades. The opposite side of the road is darkened, in turn effectively neutralizing the blinding headlight glare of the vehicle in front – no matter however bright. The special property of the shades ensure that your vision remains clear and is not impaired in any manner

By our Indiegogo campaign you can avoid a not yet occured accident and help us to get the Night Rider to everyone also.

You don't want to contribute but like our efforts? You can also help reaching it by sharing our campaign. Our referral fans can get some interestnig reward. Learn more about our referral program here.


Where to use?

Lack of streetlights on country roads and highways make the eyes get used to the dark. A glaring headlight can blind the drivers' eye the most at this time. Night Rider is developed to be worn only out of town. Country roads, highways. Even if it shades out the annoying oncoming traffic only when you make a small tilt with your head we suggest not to wear in town.

Night Rider is not a gadget, it is a really important accessory of nighttime drivers.


Night Rider protects the driver's peripheral vision from the impairment due to oncoming headlight glares but keeps it clear in the front.


Every driver has experiences about blinding beams. Out of the town it is much darker due to the lack of street lights, the headlights of an oncoming vehicle can cause blinding for seconds. At 60 m/h your car goes 90 feet/second. Your car takes this distance without your proper visual during this time. Small distance but can change someone's life forever.




Shipping

We ship worldwide. all our perks include the shipping price. You will get your Night Rider all around the world. Would we have problem sending you your wished product, we will get in touch with you immediately.


When do we ship?

Night Rider is in front of the mass production. As soon as the molds are ready for the mass production, we are starting it. It is to be in the late Q3 2014. Closing our Indiegogo campaign we will organise the pieces of the Night Riders per colors and make the mass production by that to deliver the ready products to our contributors first. This method is also the same with the cases. Seeing the needed quantity and colors we will make the mass production and deliver all Night Rider in wished color with the ordered case.


Where do we ship?

Shortly, everywhere. One of our main goal is to make the Night Rider available for everyone globally. Until you are not on Mars, we will send out your Night Rider.


"Join us, make the night driving safer together"


Hard Case

Each Night Rider is shipped with a PU leather case. They are all handmade and have a silky touch with a "Joyful to touch" feeling. Magnetic closure helps you to get your Night Rider in & out of the case with ease. We ship our product in white or black hard case, up to your choose. Colorful cases will be available when our campaign reaches a given Target Level.




What do we collect for?

We are in the early stages of the mass production. Your contribution will help the mass production to be started (including the cases) but our campaign is not only for that. We would like to build up our distributor channel to let everyone have their Night Rider.



Why do we think you are interested in this campaign?

Honestly, you will be a Night Rider owner and you can drive much safer at night. With it you will also notice others' mistakes as you are not blinded. But also helpin us to build our worldwide distribution for a safer night drive with your contribution you will also take apart in your own safety by helping us to make it available to everyone. Why? 


Because there is only one safer nighttime situation than wearing a Night Rider. If the oncoming driver also has one.




Where are we now?





Prototypes

We have got prototypes ready. They are 3D printed versions, but fully functionable (only the shaders tranparency is not available in 3D printing). Tests were made with these 3D models and even they are not exactly the same as quality is not available in 3D printing, all our testers were satisfied with the efforts and looking forward to get their Night Riders for their assistance in the development. 


This is our 2nd wave prototype. Until our molding moulds are ready, we can have just 3D printed version, which is absolutely different quality of course.

Contributing the Night Rider you vote for safer roads and participate in our project for a quiter world.


Mass Production

We are almost ready for mass production. Our molding mould is under preparation. It was designed by the newest technologies to make the Night Rider a perfectly developed product. This will make us able to make as many product, as we can sell. Our first mass production is going to be ready in Q4 2014. Our Indiegogo orders will be delivered at that time also.


Night Rider is made of molded plastic. Our mould is under contruction now.

Our team


An innovation like the Night Rider requires special team. Our team is still under construction.  We are glad to work together on this project and make a safer night driving available to everyone together. Let us shortly introduce ourselves.



   Matthias Czinki  / CEO


  Inspired by the safer transport. Leads our team to      achieve the worldwide safety on roads at night.




   Peter Kiss  / Inventor & Founder


   Entrepreneur, Inventor and Founder of the Night Rider. All    his efforts made all this possible.




   Leslie Urban  / Engineer & 3D designer


   Whatever idea in mind, he sketches in a few seconds and    make it three-dimensional.




   Zoltan K. Toth  / Strategy Master Mind


   We could not be successful without feasible project plan.     He is our mentor on our way.





We are here, ready to do our job to make the world a little safer place to live. We need your contribution now to achieve it for all of us.


We are willing to widen our team worldwide. Do you like our goal? Would you like to join us? We need responsible members to reach our goals. Send us your introduction to jobs@nightriderglasses.com.




Re-sellers & Distributors

To achieve a worldwide availability, we need potential partners worldwide. Calculating our perks we wanted to motivate those businessmen who also would like to make the roads a little safer. We already got some inquiries from all around the globe so we can proudly say, the Night Rider will be available in many countries. Would you also join our activity and make the Night Rider available for the people over there? Check out our perks and choose your re-seller quantity. Each re-seller package contains ready-for-sale packaging. English package is available but over 1000 pcs (Premium) package we deliver you the Night Rider packaged with your wished, local language without extra cost of course. Do you have any question? Just ask by sending us an email to distribution@nightriderglasses.com



Check out nightriderglasses.com for further information.





F.A.Q.


Q: Is it really working? Such a big problem can be solved so easily?
A: Yes, of course. It works perfectly. As perfect as simple. You will see.

Q: What is the Night Rider for?
A: Night Rider is an anti headlight-blindness drive glasses. It prevents the oncoming headlight blinding effect and makes the night driving safer.

Q: How does the Night Rider work?
A: It has got dark lenses, which are just lets’ say “half-lenses” as they cover only one side of the vision. Its purpose is the darkening effect on oncoming headlights’ beam just as the rearview mirrors in cars. Shaders (lenses) transparent enough not to be disturbing but will prevent from glares.

Q: Will it fit my head?
A: It is designed to fit all headsize. Absolutely adjustable and you have to set to your eyes before use indeed. The shaders are able to be set and each Night Rider is shipped with two sized nosepads (for men and women).

Q: Does it disturb my vision while wearing?
A: After setting up your Night Rider to your head it is out of your field of vision. When a disturbing light comes, you just have to tilt your head forward a little bit (only around 5 degrees) and the shader lenses will darken out only the opposite lane. You are not disturbed anywhere as only the source of the bright light is darkened. Just think it over. If you would not wear the Night Rider, you couldn’t see anything while blinded. Wearing it you will have limited (darken) vision only on the oncoming side but this feature will cause proper visual control on teh whole road.

Q: Do I have to set my Night Rider from time to time to work perfectly?
A: Certanly NO. Night Rider glasses have to be set to your eyes only before the first use. The magnetic closure, PU leather coated, handmade hard case, which is shipped to all Night Rider will keep the settings safely until the next use. But if any of the shaders or the nose pad is moved from its position, you will have to reset to your settings of course.

Q: How can I set it to my eyes? Is it hard to do?
A: Anyone can set a Night Rider by himself easily. It doesn’t take more than 10 seconds and you will never have to do it again. Each Night Rider is shipped with a set-up manual for the proper operation.

Q: What if I cannot set it to my eyes?
A: Each Night Rider is shiped with a setup manual. Wouldn't you be able to do it anyway, our support is here to help you in any questions.

Q: Isn't it uncomfortable?
A: We developed the Night Rider to be ultra-lightweight. After the first minutes you are getting used to it and will not even notice wearing it. We know, there are many people living their life with long distance trips at nighttime. For them it is very important to have a device like this as comfortable as possible.

Q: Night Rider is a little strange for me. Why does it have so unique outfit from other glasses?
A:Night Rider’s innovation is in the half-sized, only one sided lenses. If you drive a left-wheeled vehicle, the oncoming vehicles are passing you from the left. They will blind you also from the left. So you need the darkening lenses on the left side of your field of vision. Night Rider darkens here only. The traffic in fron of you, in your lane stays uncovered so you will see perfectly. We know, the result of this innovation is a “strange” outfit, but it is only for your safe.

Q: What is the difference between the Night Rider Basic and the Night Rider UP models?
A: The “Basic” is the black version. All colored Night Riders are called “UP” version.

Q: I would like to order Basic and UP model also in one package. How can I have exclusive pack?
A: We can deliver you any package mixed. Please conact us for exclusive packages.

Q: I did not find answer to my question. How can I contact you?
A: We are pleased to answer any of your questions. You can visit our homepage www.nightriderglasses.com or just choose your most relevant topic and send us your email:

Press & Media - press@nightriderglasses.com

Sales, Order, Shipping - sales@nightriderglasses.com

Distributional questions - distribution@nightriderglasses.com

Anything else - support@nightriderglasses.com





Come with us, it is high time to support a really useful and life-saver innovation...

How?
Indiegogo has a fantastic feature. Each logged in member has special URL codes to every campaigns. So that we can track your incoming guests. Sharing our campaign, you get 2 USD refund after every contributor, who are coming to our campaign through your shared link.
After you logged in to your Indiegogo account, you just have to copy the URL from your browser and send it to your friends. You can also use social media or just share our campaign with automatic URL sharing with the buttons above. 
Learn more about our referral program HERE.




Millions need it day by day already. There is a huge importance in the nighttime traffic for the Night Rider.






Target levels




We need a minimum of USD 25.000 to bring this LIFE SAVING innovation to people around the world. However, if you support us to the hilt, we have exciting plans as stretch goals as mentioned below. Unlocking any target level, all contributors will enjoy the new features.
The final goal is to make the night drive much safer but there are steps which can make us closer to that. Making the best product available to everyone is our goal.





Night Rider is for everyone. Each contributor takes part of the safer night driving to come true. Join us and cooperate for a safer traffic.

Colorful cases
We ship out the Night Rider in black or white hard cases, up to your choice but we would like to have plenty of colorful cases also. One of our Target Level will unlock this feature. After that all of our contributors (supporters before reaching of the Target Level also) will able to re-choose their wished case if want a colorful instead the white or black case.

Bicolor Night Rider

We know, you want your Night Rider in your style. We will make it available for you. Reaching our target level, the Bicolor version will be available also. If you already backed for a Night Rider, you will be able to upgrade the UP model to a bicolor version for only 1 USD.
Patterned Night Rider
The same. We want to make Night Riders with iconic schemes like military, carbonfibre, gold, chrome, animals, flowers, textile coated, striped, spotted, hearts, wood-like, etc.
Referral Competition Prize
Unlocking this target level we will send our top 3 referrals with their partner to an advanced driving course to acquire the know-how of the safe drive. We don't want to reveal every detail yet but can say it will be incredibly exciting. Adrenaline junkies would love.


Your family is more secured during a nighttime travel if the oncoming drivers wear Night Rider. This campaign will help them to get their own.






Night Rider 2

We cannot tell too much about our next product as it is not developed yet and is an intellectual property also, but can proudly say, we have invented the semi-automatic working Night Rider which will revolutionize the nighttime traffic even better than the Night Rider. Unlocking the target level we can finish the development and give a 30% discount to everyone who took apart in this campaign. Whichever perk you choose, you will get a discount coupon, which you will be able to exchange as soon as it will be ready, around the Q3 2014. Help us, help everyone on the roads. Your trust will make it available. (above .gif is not taken of the Night Rider 2)

How does the Night Rider work?
NIGHT RIDER is a so simple solution, can be used by anyone. The principle of its operation is that the shaders are situated so close to the eyes, it is enough to tilt your head forward not more than 3-5 degrees and it absolutely darkens the blinding headlights.
We developed the shaders to darken only just as much as it is really needed to not be blinded by the oncoming traffic, but it is still transparent enough to follow their course perfectly. The darkening level is just as much as it is used to be built in to the rearview mirrors in the cars.





Principle of work

Night Rider consists of two pieces of dark shades on a frame, uniquely positioned in front of the eyes so that a slight head tilt deviates the eyes’ positions on the pieces of shades. The opposite side of the road is darkened, in turn effectively neutralizing the blinding headlight glare of the vehicle in front – no matter however bright. The special property of the shades ensure that your vision remains clear and is not impaired in any manner
By our Indiegogo campaign you can avoid a not yet occured accident and help us to get the Night Rider to everyone also.
You don't want to contribute but like our efforts? You can also help reaching it by sharing our campaign. Our referral fans can get some interestnig reward. Learn more about our referral program here.


Where to use?
Lack of streetlights on country roads and highways make the
eyes get used to the dark. A glaring headlight can blind the drivers' eye the
most at this time. Night Rider is developed to be worn only out of town.
Country roads, highways. Even if it shades out the annoying oncoming traffic
only when you make a small tilt with your head we suggest not to wear in town.

Night Rider is not a gadget, it is a really important
accessory of nighttime drivers.

Night Rider protects the driver's peripheral vision from the impairment due to oncoming headlight glares but keeps it clear in the front.
Every driver has experiences about blinding beams. Out of
the town it is much darker due to the lack of street lights, the headlights of
an oncoming vehicle can cause blinding for seconds. At 60 m/h your car goes 90
feet/second. Your car takes this distance without your proper visual during this
time. Small distance but can change someone's life forever.




Shipping


We ship worldwide. all our perks include the shipping price.
You will get your Night Rider all around the world. Would we have problem
sending you your wished product, we will get in touch with you immediately.

When do we ship?
Night Rider is in front of the mass production. As soon as
the molds are ready for the mass production, we are starting it. It is to be in
the late Q3 2014. Closing our Indiegogo campaign we will organise the pieces of
the Night Riders per colors and make the mass production by that to deliver the
ready products to our contributors first. This method is also the same with the
cases. Seeing the needed quantity and colors we will make the mass production
and deliver all Night Rider in wished color with the ordered case.

Where do we ship?
Shortly, everywhere. One of our main goal is to make the Night Rider available for everyone globally. Until you are not on Mars, we will send out your Night Rider.


"Join us, make the night driving safer together"



Hard Case
Each Night Rider is shipped with a PU leather case. They are all handmade and have a silky touch with a "Joyful to touch" feeling. Magnetic closure helps you to get your Night Rider in & out of the case with ease. We ship our product in white or black hard case, up to your choose. Colorful cases will be available when our campaign reaches a given Target Level.


What do we collect for?


We are in the early stages of the mass production. Your contribution will help the mass production to be started (including the cases) but our campaign is not only for that. We would like to build up our distributor channel to let everyone have their Night Rider.



Why do we think you are interested in this campaign?
Honestly, you will be a Night Rider owner and you can drive much safer at night. With it you will also notice others' mistakes as you are not blinded. But also helpin us to build our worldwide distribution for a safer night drive with your contribution you will also take apart in your own safety by helping us to make it available to everyone. Why? 

Because there is only one safer nighttime situation  than wearing a Night Rider. If the oncoming driver also has one.






Where are we now?







Prototypes

We have got prototypes ready. They are 3D printed versions,
but fully functionable (only the shaders tranparency is not available in 3D
printing). Tests were made with these 3D models and even they are not exactly
the same as quality is not available in 3D printing, all our testers were
satisfied with the efforts and looking forward to get their Night Riders for
their assistance in the development. 



This is our 2nd wave prototype. Until our molding moulds are ready, we can have just 3D printed version, which is absolutely different quality of course.



Contributing the Night Rider you vote for safer roads and participate in our project for a quiter world.

Mass Production
We are almost ready for mass production. Our molding mould is under preparation. It was designed by the newest technologies to make the Night Rider a perfectly developed product. This will make us able to make as many product, as we can sell. Our first mass production is going to be ready in Q4 2014. Our Indiegogo orders will be delivered at that time also.





Night Rider is made of molded plastic. Our mould is under contruction now.




Our team



An innovation like the
Night Rider requires special team. Our team is still under construction.  We are glad to work together on this project
and make a safer night driving available to everyone together. Let us shortly
introduce ourselves.




   Matthias Czinki  / CEO
  Inspired by the safer transport. Leads our team to      achieve the worldwide safety on roads at night.





   Peter Kiss  / Inventor & Founder
   Entrepreneur, Inventor and Founder of the Night Rider. All     his efforts made all this possible.




   Leslie Urban  / Engineer & 3D designer
   Whatever idea in mind, he sketches in a few seconds and    make it three-dimensional.




   Zoltan K. Toth  / Strategy Master Mind
   We could not be successful without feasible project plan.     He is our mentor on our way.
We are here, ready to do our job to make the world a little safer place to live. We need your contribution now to achieve it for all of us.

We are willing to
widen our team worldwide. Do you like our goal? Would you like to join us? We need responsible members to reach our goals. Send us your introduction to jobs@nightriderglasses.com.





Re-sellers & Distributors


To achieve a worldwide availability, we need potential partners worldwide. Calculating our perks we wanted to motivate those businessmen who also would like to make the roads a little safer. We already got some inquiries from all around the globe so we can proudly say, the Night Rider will be available in many countries. Would you also join our activity and make the Night Rider available for the people over there? Check out our perks and choose your re-seller quantity. Each re-seller package contains ready-for-sale packaging. English package is available but over 1000 pcs (Premium) package we deliver you the Night Rider packaged with your wished, local language without extra cost of course. Do you have any question? Just ask by sending us an email to distribution@nightriderglasses.com



Check out
nightriderglasses.com for further information.






F.A.Q.

Q: Is it really working? Such a big problem can be solved so easily?

A: Yes, of course. It works perfectly. As perfect as simple. You will see.

Q: What is the Night Rider for?


A: Night Rider is an anti headlight-blindness drive glasses. It prevents the oncoming headlight blinding effect and makes the night driving safer.
Q: How does the Night Rider work?

A: It has got dark lenses, which are just lets’ say “half-lenses” as they cover only one side of the vision. Its purpose is the darkening effect on oncoming headlights’ beam just as the rearview mirrors in cars. Shaders (lenses) transparent enough not to be disturbing but will prevent from glares.
Q: Will it fit my head?

A: It is designed to fit all headsize. Absolutely adjustable and you have to set to your eyes before use indeed. The shaders are able to be set and each Night Rider is shipped with two sized nosepads (for men and women).

Q: Does it disturb my vision while wearing?


A: After setting up your Night Rider to your head it is out of your field of vision. When a disturbing light comes, you just have to tilt your head forward a little bit (only around 5 degrees) and the shader lenses will darken out only the opposite lane. You are not disturbed anywhere as only the source of the bright light is darkened. Just think it over. If you would not wear the Night Rider, you couldn’t see anything while blinded. Wearing it you will have limited (darken) vision only on the oncoming side but this feature will cause proper visual control on teh whole road.


Q: Do I have to set my Night Rider from time to time to work perfectly?


A: Certanly NO. Night Rider glasses have to be set to your eyes only before the first use. The magnetic closure, PU leather coated, handmade hard case, which is shipped to all Night Rider will keep the settings safely until the next use. But if any of the shaders or the nose pad is moved from its position, you will have to reset to your settings of course.


Q: How can I set it to my eyes? Is it hard to do?



A: Anyone can set a Night Rider by himself easily. It doesn’t take more than 10 seconds and you will never have to do it again. Each Night Rider is shipped with a set-up manual for the proper operation.
Q: What if I cannot set it to my eyes?

A: Each Night Rider is shiped with a setup manual. Wouldn't you be able to do it anyway, our support is here to help you in any questions.
Q: Isn't it uncomfortable?


A: We developed the Night Rider to be ultra-lightweight. After the first minutes you are getting used to it and will not even notice wearing it. We know, there are many people living their life with long distance trips at nighttime. For them it is very important to have a device like this as comfortable as possible.


Q: Night Rider is a little strange for me. Why does it have so unique outfit from other glasses?



A:Night Rider’s innovation is in the half-sized, only one sided lenses. If you drive a left-wheeled vehicle, the oncoming vehicles are passing you from the left. They will blind you also from the left. So you need the darkening lenses on the left side of your field of vision. Night Rider darkens here only. The traffic in fron of you, in your lane stays uncovered so you will see perfectly. We know, the result of this innovation is a “strange” outfit, but it is only for your safe.


Q: What is the difference between the Night Rider Basic and the Night Rider UP models?



A: The “Basic” is the black version. All colored Night Riders are called “UP” version.

Q: I would like to order Basic and UP model also in one package. How can I have exclusive pack?


A: We can deliver you any package mixed. Please conact us for exclusive packages.






Q: I did
not find answer to my question. How can I contact you?


A: We are pleased to answer any of your questions. You can visit our homepage www.nightriderglasses.com or just choose your most relevant topic and send us your email:
Press & Media - press@nightriderglasses.com
Sales, Order, Shipping - sales@nightriderglasses.com
Distributional questions - distribution@nightriderglasses.com
Anything else - support@nightriderglasses.com






Come with us, it is high time to support a really useful and life-saver innovation...

story:
Short Summary

Hi everyone!  My name is Jon.  I have been growing a beard for roughly 6 months now.  I originally decided to start growing it out because I thought that looking back on my life in my old age and realizing I never grew a full manly beard at any point would truly be a shame.  I guess you could say that growing a beard was on my bucket list.  My beard still isn't as full and large as I wanted it to be, but I've run into a small problem.  Meet my fiancee Julie:

In case you can't tell, she is not a fan of the beard.  Being the wonderful guy that I am, I agreed to get rid of it, but only if something good came out of the (understandably depressing) ordeal.  That's when I decided to try and crowdfund a donation to charity for shaving my beard!

What We Need & What You Get

I'm not exactly sure what kind of perks I can offer, given the campaign, but here are the few I've thought of:

  • A heartfelt thank you email
  • Before and after pictures
  • A video of the beard murder
  • And for one lucky stranger who donates an exorbitant amount, the privilege of shaving my beard off (I won't be paying for any travel expenses, so Cleveland, OH locals would be best for this; if you're willing to finance your own travel, go for it!)

    The Impact

    Seeing as how if the goal is met, the project will fund right after November, it seemed fitting to donate all proceeds of the campaign to the Prostate Cancer Foundation.  A close friend of my family's was diagnosed with prostate cancer when I was young, and although prostate cancer typically has a very high survival rate, and he fought very bravely, he eventually succumbed to the disease after 5 years and passed on.  If I have to shave my beard, I can at least try to help others in his situation with your contributions!

    Risks & Challenges

    Unfortunately, I haven't been growing my beard for very long, so it isn't too spectacular as far as facial hair goes, but let me assure you, I've grown extremely attached to this face-warmer, and I'm pretty sad to see it go.  I've spent an unusually high amount of time in the sun this summer, and I'm almost certain that I'll have a pale reminder of what could have been after the deed is done.  Apart from that, I don't think there will be any risks or challenges (unless of course some catastrophic event results in the loss of all razors across the entire world.)

      Other Ways You Can Help

      You don't need to contribute here if you want to help a good cause!  Remember, you can always find your favorite charity or a charity that does work for a cause that you're passionate about and donate directly to it!
